home.aboutIntro: This guide comes from years of visiting restaurants in Gipuzkoa and documenting what is truly worth recommending. You will find a curated, practical, and honest selection to decide better.
home.howStep1Desc: I started by sharing personal recommendations of places with great product and execution.
home.howStep2Desc: We turned that curation into a database with categories, price, rating, and map links.
home.howStep3Desc: Filter by what matters to you, open map, and decide quickly with real context.
home.categoriesOptionsSubtitle: You can choose category from here without showing the full category grid on Home.
home.asierSelectionCompactSubtitle: A direct shortlist to start without losing time.
home.title: Gipuzkoa restaurants selected with an authorial point of view
home.subtitle: A personal and up-to-date guide to decide where to eat better, with local context and direct map access.
home.selectionSubtitle: Top picks based on rating, consistency, and real on-site experience.
home.principleTechniqueDesc: Solid execution, precise cooking, and personality.
home.principleConsistencyDesc: Steady level in kitchen, service, and dining room.
home.weeklySubtitle: Restaurants curated by Asier based on rating, consistency, and real experience.
home.categoriesSubtitle: Quickly find the cuisine style you want, with real counts by category.
home.errorHighlights: The curated selection could not be loaded.
home.signatureQuote: I do not only look for memorable dishes. I look for places you will want to revisit.

hero.subtitle: The best gourmet recommendations in Gipuzkoa.
hero.description: Curated with local criteria and an editorial perspective.

about.title: About Asier
about.description1: shares gastronomic recommendations focused on product, technique, and overall experience.
about.description2: This guide brings together restaurants, categories, and emerging profiles to discover Gipuzkoa through an editorial lens.
about.quote: Great dining is also about understanding the territory and its people.

talents.title: Young talents shaping the next chapter of gastronomy
talents.subtitle: Rising profiles in kitchen, service, wine, and innovation that Asier considers key to follow the local scene.

talents.spotlightText: A selection to discover who is raising the gastronomic standard.
talents.curationNote: Profiles are highlighted for vision, execution, and real ability to elevate the dining experience.
